_source.text: 1) bush went after saddam because he wanted to get the man who tried to shoot his paw, to show he was better than his paw (he's never passed beyond cowboy movies in his personal development.)

text: 1) bush went after saddam **because** he wanted to get the man who tried to **shoot** his paw, to **show** he
was **better** **than** his paw (he's never passed beyond **cowboy** movies in his personal development.)
